resources.string: To start turn on bluetooth in settings
Your smartphone does not support Bluetooth
Therefore, we will not be able to connect the device
For Bluetooth proper work, the location service must be turned on in your phone settings.
Covid Control is here to help you and your community to keep safe and take the appropriate measures in case necessary.\nWe are in this together, and each one of us plays an important role.
All location tracking data is securely stored and does not leave your phone unless you get sick and want to notify your contacts, in either an anonymous or a transparent way.
